record.title: MEASURES INDEFINITELY POSTPONED--S. 2131, S. 2107, S. 2150
record.narrative:
MEASURES INDEFINITELY POSTPONED--S. 2131, S. 2107, S. 2150 -- (Senate - December 04, 2007)

[Page: S14748]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent the following calendar numbers be indefinitely postponed en bloc: Calendar No. 433, Calendar No. 490, and Calendar No. 492.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
